response.original_title: MI ABUELA ESTA LOCA DE REMATE
response.overview: Amanda, a single mother of three, asks her mother Rogelia to take care of her grandchildren for a while. Rogelia accepts her daughter's request because she believes that her grandchildren are little angels. They, for their part, believe that since they will stay with their grandmother, who is an elderly "Christian and sick" person, they will do whatever they please. What they don't count on and are about to discover is that their grandmother is completely crazy.
response.title: MI ABUELA ESTA LOCA DE REMATE
